name: cstrfinder
description: cstrfinder find bugs in string compares
longdescription:
# cstrfinder
find bugs in string compares
Based on the ideas of [@disconnect3d_pl](https://twitter.com/disconnect3d_pl/). It checks for string and memcompares where the passed length parameter does not fit with the value that is passed. Fur further information about the idea see @disconnect3d_pl's [slides](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1VpXqzPIPrfIPSIiua5ClNkjKAzM3uKlyAKUf0jBqoUI/edit#slide=id.g70c6018123_0_12) and [presenation](https://youtu.be/-xVBd8MGlJs?t=192)
.##Examples 
[Example Output](https://github.com/murx-/cstrnfinder/blob/master/img/screenshot.png?raw=true)
